alert.note: Alert for Banks; Barrow; Forsyth; Gwinnett; Hall; Jackson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 12 at 3:56PM EST until January 12 at 4:45PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Barrow County in north central Georgia... Central Forsyth County in north central Georgia... Northern Gwinnett County in north central Georgia... Banks County in northeastern Georgia... Hall County in north central Georgia... Northwestern Jackson County in northeastern Georgia... * Until 445 PM EST. * At 356 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Gainesville to near Duluth, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Gainesville, Lawrenceville, Winder, Jefferson, Commerce, Cumming, Homer, Peachtree Corners, Duluth, Sugar Hill, Suwanee, Buford, Braselton, Auburn, Flowery Branch, Dacula, Oakwood, Lula, Maysville and Berkeley Lake. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM EST for north central Georgia. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 700 PM EST for north central and northeastern Georgia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.

area.areaDesc: Banks; Barrow; Forsyth; Gwinnett; Hall; Jackson
